name: WRTW-DBRawTruthRadio
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: raw truth radio
des:
"WRTW-DB [Raw Truth Radio] is a proud member of the Digital Broadcasters Association and is the ""Internet Home of Good Music!"", spinning Hip Hop, R&B, and Throwbacks. 

Streaming since 2013 Raw Truth Radio operates with a commitment to the culture of music. We are the only station that gives Unsigned/Independent artists a chance to go head-to-head with Major/Mainstream artists and win! Raw Truth Radio has established itself as the leader in this style of Internet broadcasting. We stay true to our Motto, ""We're Working Over Here!"""
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
